pull.title: [tests] New fuzz target wallet_rpc
pull.body:
This change adds a new fuzz target `wallet_rpc`,
this change was suggested in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/29901

This change use some of the functionality of the fuzz target `rpc` to also target the wallet rpc's

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#30664](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30664) (build: Remove Autotools-based build system by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<sub>Debug: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/runs/28242205421</sub>

<details><summary>Hints</summary>

Make sure to run all tests locally, according to the documentation.

The failure may happen due to a number of reasons, for example:

* Possibly due to a silent merge conflict (the changes in this pull request being
incompatible with the current code in the target branch). If so, make sure to rebase on the latest
commit of the target branch.

* A sanitizer issue, which can only be found by compiling with the sanitizer and running the
  affected test.

* An intermittent issue.

Leave a comment here, if you need help tracking down a confusing failure.

</details>
Concept ACK. To fix the CI failure, you'll have to move the new file to `src/wallet/test/fuzz/`.

verification.payload:
tree 1ecaf4522a4ba80730c5c4ac3ff8e2c04599e48a
parent 94c307b3c0746a08c6135ff38d6f1ad1ed6693bb
author kevkevinpal <oapallikunnel@gmail.com> 1721739531 -0400
committer kevkevinpal <oapallikunnel@gmail.com> 1725418788 -0400

test: new fuzz target wallet_rpc

By reusing some of the logic for the rpc fuzz target this new fuzz
target wallet_rpc adds coverage to the wallet rpc calls.

events.message:
test: new fuzz target wallet_rpc

By reusing some of the logic for the rpc fuzz target this new fuzz
target wallet_rpc adds coverage to the wallet rpc calls.

comments.body: I will need to move some of these over due to the rpc accessing the disk or network activity

This change should be replaced with the following diff:
```diff
--- a/src/wallet/test/fuzz/CMakeLists.txt
+++ b/src/wallet/test/fuzz/CMakeLists.txt
@@ -10,6 +10,7 @@ target_sources(fuzz
     fees.cpp
     $<$<BOOL:${USE_SQLITE}>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/notifications.cpp>
     parse_iso8601.cpp
+    rpc.cpp
     $<$<BOOL:${USE_SQLITE}>:${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/scriptpubkeyman.cpp>
     wallet_bdb_parser.cpp
 )
```
